title: Code of Conduct
description: Our Code of Conduct outlines the expected behavior for all members of our community. It ensures a safe, respectful, and inclusive environment for everyone.

title: Rules and Regulations
description: Our Rules and Regulations provide guidelines and standards for participation in our activities. They help maintain fairness, integrity, and compliance within our organization.

title: Membership Guidelines
description: The Membership Guidelines outline the requirements and benefits of becoming a member of the boxing federation. It covers eligibility criteria, membership categories, and privileges.

title: Competition Rules
description: The Competition Rules detail the rules and regulations governing boxing competitions organized by the federation. It includes information on weight classes, scoring criteria, and safety protocols.

title: Anti-Doping Policy
description: The Anti-Doping Policy outlines the federation's stance on doping in sports and outlines the procedures for testing and consequences for doping violations.

title: Coach and Official Certification
description: The Coach and Official Certification document provides information on the certification process for boxing coaches and officials. It includes training requirements and accreditation criteria.

title: Medical Guidelines
description: The Medical Guidelines detail the medical requirements and protocols for boxers participating in federation-sanctioned events. It covers pre-fight medical examinations and injury management procedures.

title: Event Hosting Guidelines
description: The Event Hosting Guidelines outline the procedures and requirements for hosting boxing events under the federation's jurisdiction. It includes venue standards, event promotion, and logistical considerations.

title: Disciplinary Procedures
description: The Disciplinary Procedures document explains the disciplinary procedures and sanctions for athletes, coaches, and officials found to have violated federation rules or engaged in misconduct.

title: Insurance Coverage
description: The Insurance Coverage document provides information on insurance coverage available to members, athletes, and officials participating in federation activities. It includes liability and medical insurance.
